title: Bukkit可以获取到PlayerEggThrowEvent事件的位置吗？
author: 千雪佳奈
txt_content:
玩家在投掷鸡蛋后可以获取到鸡蛋的那个坐标吗？
PlayerEggThrowEvent

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
PlayerEggThrowEvent#getEgg
然后Egg继承了entity类的getLocation方法

replies.author: 千雪佳奈
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-7-27 20:34
PlayerEggThrowEvent#getEgg
然后Egg继承了entity类的getLocation方法
谢谢
